hackathon-description-text: Hackathon@HKUST 2014 is open to all undergraduate students, postgraduate students, and alumni of HKUST

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering

hackathon-eligibility: Hackathon@HKUST 2014 will be open to ALL undergraduate students, postgraduate students, and alumni of HKUST
hackathon-rules: Hackathon@HKUST 2014 will be open to ALL undergraduate students, postgraduate students, and alumni of HKUST.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Cash Prize + dinner with Radica founding team
Best Innovators prize sponsored by Divide
Cash prize sponsored by Department of CSE
Voted by the audience. Prize sponsored by Radica.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How robust is your idea and how thorough have you thought about your solution?
The user interface design, user experience, and overall usability of the system.
Implementation of your solution, the technology employed, architecture design, and implemented prototype.
Thinking about your solution from the economic perspectives, the eye of investors, your stakeholders, and your customers.
Presentation of your solution to public.

hackathon-description-header: Ignite your idea. Build a great app. Expand your network.
